Smile, it’s free therapy.
Wear a smile – one size fits all.
There is always a reason to smile. Find it.
Worry less, smile more. Don’t regret, just learn and grow.
I was smiling yesterday, I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow. Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
Hi, dear friend. I see you’re without your smile today. I’ll gladly give you one of mine.
A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
Smile… it will either warm their heart or piss them off… either way, you win.
A friendly look, a kindly smile, one good act, and life’s worthwhile.
Never think hard about the PAST, it brings tears. Don’t think more about the FUTURE, it brings fears. Live this moment with a smile, it brings cheers.
Keep a smile on your face and let your personality be your autograph.
Life is like a mirror, we get the best results when we smile at it.
A smile is something you can’t give away; it always comes back to you.
If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
Before you put on a frown, make absolutely sure there are no smiles available.
A smile is happiness you will find right under your nose.
Smile… even if it’s just to annoy someone.
It takes seventeen muscles to smile and forty-three to frown.
Smile – sunshine is good for your teeth.
Always wear a smile because you never know who is watching.
You are not fully dressed until you wear a smile.
Keep smiling… It makes people wonder what you’ve been up to.
If you don’t have a smile, I’ll give you one of mine.
Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been.
Happy girls are the prettiest pink pouch.
Don’t worry – you haven’t lost your smile. It’s right under your nose. You simply forgot it was there.
Smile at everyone, you never know who’s an angel.
If you’re stressed, you’ll get pimples… If you cry, you’ll get wrinkles… So, why don’t you smile and get dimples? Keep smiling it’s very simple.
The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
I can hack your tears away but only if you give me the password to your smile.
A smile is the best makeup any girl can wear.
I keep my head held high and smile because there are people who will kill to see me fall.
I’m really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot and I’m really sexy.
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strengths from distress and grows brave by reflection.
Don’t cry for a man who’s left you–the next one may fall for your smile.
I never get tired of smiling. I’m just the kind of guy who likes to smile.
I have many problems in life. But my lips don’t know that. They always smile.
When you wake up every morning, look in the mirror and give yourself a big smile. The smile is a sacred gift of life.
Smiling is the best way to face every problem, to crush every fear and to hide every pain.
I enjoy jokes, smiling, and making people smile. I may be a little different, but that’s OK, who wants to be normal anyway?
I like to smile when its natural. I’m not mad or anything. That’s my style.
A smile appeared upon her face as if she’d taken it directly from her handbag and pinned it there.
Show me a smile, and I’ll show you one back.
Worry less. Smile more. Listen carefully. Take responsibility. Accept what you can’t change. Embrace the lessons. Love your life. Today.
Keep smiling and brighten someone’s day.
Seven billion smiles and yours is my favorite.
Your smile is the prettiest thing that makes me fall for you again and again. I love you.
Looking at your smile is also a source of happiness for me.
You make me happy and my heart smile. I love you in the way you are.
She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
Before I met you, I didn’t know what it was like to look at someone and smile for no reason at all.
Your cute smile and your happy laughter attracted me to you, but your caring loving heart is the reason why I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
Your smile is like the sunshine and it brightens up my day. Your thoughts in my head create the sweetest melody and I can’t help but fall for you.
One smile can’t change the world, but your smile changes to mine.
More smiling, less worrying. More compassion, less judgment. More blessed, less stressed. More love, less hate.
Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
Keep smiling – it takes 10 years off!
Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody’s heart.
I’ve had to learn to fight all my life – got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
Smile, even if it’s a sad smile because sadder than a sad smile is a sadness of not knowing how to smile.
Some day everything will all make perfect sense. So, for now, laugh at the confusion, smile through the tears, and keep reminding yourself that everything happens for a reason…
It takes a lot of energy to be negative. You have to work at it. But smiling is painless. I’d rather spend my energy smiling.
Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
Silence and smile are two powerful tools. A smile is the way to solve many problems and silence is the way to avoid many problems.
Make today as beautiful as you can. Let no one take away your happiness. Smile and laugh at the negativity, you’re good.
Keeping a smile on your face when inside you feel like dying, for the sake of supporting others is Strength.
Sunshine warms us, as do smiles—which makes me think that smiles are sunbeams reflected off our teeth.
Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
Smile, it’s free therapy.

There is always a reason to smile. Find it.
